    • Uses of Matrix in backpropagation

      Fields in backpropagation declared as Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Matrix HammingCodeTest.testData
      Test data Matrix, shape(2000,11)
      (package private) Matrix HammingCodeTest.testlabelData
      Test label Matrix, shape(2000,4)
      (package private) Matrix HammingCodeTest.trainData
      Train data Matrix, shape(48,11)
      (package private) Matrix HammingCodeTest.trainlabelData
      Train label Matrix, shape(48,4)
      Methods in backpropagation that return Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Matrix XORTest.getTestData()
      Returns the same as XORTest.getTrainData()
      Matrix VierBitXor.getTestData()
      returns a matrix consisting of all 2^4 = 16 different possible 4-bit sequences
      abstract Matrix Test.getTestData()
      Loads or optionally calculates test data of a certain type, returns the test data in a matrix
      Matrix HammingCodeTest.getTestData()
      Returns the already initialized field HammingCodeTest.testData
      Matrix XORTest.getTestLabels()
      Returns the same as XORTest.getTrainLabels()
      Matrix VierBitXor.getTestLabels()
      returns a matrix consisting of 4-bit XOR labels corresponding to the 16 4-bit sequences from VierBitXor.getTestData()
      abstract Matrix Test.getTestLabels()
      Loads or optionally calculates test data labels of a certain type, returns the test data labels in a matrix
      Matrix HammingCodeTest.getTestLabels()
      Returns the already initialized field HammingCodeTest.testlabelData
      Matrix XORTest.getTrainData()
      Generates Matrix of train data for the XOR problem Note that the train data is equal to the test data in the XOR case
      Matrix VierBitXor.getTrainData()
      Returns test data, train and test data are identical in this case, since overfitting in 4-bit xor or any logical function with a finitely big scope of definition is not pointless.
      abstract Matrix Test.getTrainData()
      Loads or optionally calculates train data of a certain type, returns the train data in a matrix
      Matrix HammingCodeTest.getTrainData()
      Returns the already initialized field HammingCodeTest.trainData
      Matrix XORTest.getTrainLabels()
      Generates Matrix of train data labels for the XOR problem.
      Matrix VierBitXor.getTrainLabels()
      Returns test data labels, train and test data are identical in this case, since overfitting in 4-bit xor or any logical function with a finitely big scope of definition is not pointless.
      abstract Matrix Test.getTrainLabels()
      Loads or optionally calculates train data labels of a certain type, returns the train data labels in a matrix
      Matrix HammingCodeTest.getTrainLabels()
      Returns the already initialized field HammingCodeTest.trainlabelData
